item.createfisheryindustry.waxed_cardboa: Test item. It will be released in the upcoming new mod 'Create: Over the Sea' in the future. Stay tuned.
An ancient, worn harpoon lost in the depths; polish it to restore its former gloss
item.createfisheryindustry.copper_diving: Copper Diving Leggings used with diving boots to experience a moonwalk-like feeling underwater.
The wearer gains super jump ability in water, up to four blocks high, with no fall damage upon landing.
item.createfisheryindustry.netherite_div: Netherite Diving Leggings used with diving boots to experience a moonwalk-like feeling underwater or in lava seas.
The wearer gains super jump ability in water or lava, up to four blocks high, with no fall damage upon landing.
item.createfisheryindustry.harpoon_pouch: Holds up to 4 harpoons. Automatically replenishes a harpoon to the main hand after throwing and prioritizes storing picked-up harpoons in the pouch.
item.createfisheryindustry.pneumatic_har: Powered by compressed air. Shoots a harpoon that pulls hit entities toward you or pulls you toward blocks. Can remotely collect items.
Shoots harpoon, right click again to draws it back
block.createfisheryindustry.frame_trap.t: Captures nearby fish, or other small creatures, and items along the path. Also gains fishing loot from the current biome over time. Grants experience nuggets when fishing triggers or creatures are captured.
block.createfisheryindustry.mesh_trap.to: Automatically collects nearby items, captures fish, or other small creatures, and stores them
Capture specified entity, gain its loot and experience nuggets.
Extracts items, up to one stack at a time.
Attach to the front of an Encased Fan to distribute its effect on Entities in all directions.
When attached to an encased fan:
Automatically collects nearby items, captures fish, or other small creatures, and stores them
Extracts items, up to one stack at a time.
block.createfisheryindustry.smart_mesh.t: Smart Mesh automatically collects nearby items and stores them.
Extracts items, up to one stack at a time.
block.createfisheryindustry.smart_beehiv: Test block, the functions are still under development. This block is not part of the content of this mod 'Create: Fishery Industry'. It will be released in the upcoming new mod 'Create: Dinner' in the future. Stay tuned.
block.createfisheryindustry.mechanical_p: A mechanical component for processing peeling recipes and interacting with certain entities

Processes peeling recipes, similar to a mechanical saw. Can shear sheep or harvest scutes from turtles and armadillos. Can strip bark from entire trees, remove rust and wax from blocks, and harvest mature amethyst clusters.
